message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,500. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,400. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $7,600. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $7,350?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $7,350. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $7,500. This is already a very competitive price, and I'm not sure I can go any lower.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $7,250?

Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $7,400. This is already a very competitive price, and I'm not sure I can go any lower.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $7,200?

Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $7,200. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $7,300. This is already a very competitive price, and I'm not sure I can go any lower.

Alice, I've made a serious offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'll meet you at $7,200, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to accept, I'll have to consider other options.
